Partner Integrations

There is safety in numbers and birds of a feather flock together.

Thatâ€™s why Ximble built its infrastructure on an open-ended API architecture system, allowing for seamless integration with some of the most reputable and like-minded businesses around.

We are proud to have partnerships with these fine companies and have created a client-centric ecosystem for providing a complete business solution to our customers. If you and your organization are interested in becoming a Ximble integration partner, let us know.

bamboo
bamboo

BambooHR is an online human resource (HR) software designed for small and medium-sized businesses.

quickbooks
quickbooks

QuickBooks makes it easy to manage payroll, inventory, sales and other needs of a small business.

gusto
gusto

Gusto provides payroll, benefits and HR to modern companies.

myob
myob

MYOB (Mind Your Own Business) provides tax, accounting and other services to small and mid-sized businesses.

traxpayroll
traxpayroll

TRAXPayroll provides payroll and human resources services to businesses of all sizes.

epson
epson

Epson is a global manufacturer and supplier of high-quality technology products.

xero
xero

Xero makes it easy to manage invoicing, bank reconciliation, bookkeeping, and more.

lightspeed
lightspeed

Lightspeed is a point-of-sale software provider for retailers and restaurateurs.

kounta
kounta

Kounta offers point-of-sale (POS) and payment processing solutions for the retail and food services industries.

zendesk
zendesk

Zendesk offers scalable customer support and helpdesk solutions for a wide variety of industries.

onelogin
onelogin

Onelogin provides cloud-based access, security and compliance solutions for businesses around the globe.

adp
adp

ADP is a world leader in payroll processing and human resources. ADP offers solutions for small, medium and enterprise level businesses worldwide.
